item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 20, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Tiny Glade 'built' its way to >600k sold in a month (151 points | 30 comments)
2. Webvm: Virtual Machine for the Web (58 points | 12 comments)
3. Epic Allows Internet Archive to Distribute Unreal and Unreal Tournament Forever (106 points | 18 comments)
4. Using Erlang hot code updates (176 points | 37 comments)
5. Meta Uses LLMs to Improve Incident Response (32 points | 5 comments)
6. SpaceX Super Heavy splashes down in the gulf, canceling chopsticks landing (168 points | 234 comments)
7. Open Riak – open, modern Riak fork (148 points | 52 comments)
8. Fair coins tend to land on the side they started (342 points | 168 comments)
9. Using uv with PyTorch (90 points | 16 comments)
10. Tiling with Three Polygons Is Undecidable (50 points | 11 comments)
11. Is the 80 character line limit still relevant? (2008) (66 points | 141 comments)
12. Call for Developer Projects (47 points | 5 comments)
13. Bottles of OOP now available in Python (121 points | 25 comments)
14. Show HN: Physically accurate black hole simulation using your iPhone camera (243 points | 96 comments)
15. GroMo (YC W21) Is Hiring ( | hide)
16. OpenStreetMap's New Vector Tiles (377 points | 136 comments)
17. Hand Tracking for Mouse Input (154 points | 33 comments)
18. Apple Confirms Zero-Day Attacks Hitting macOS Systems (133 points | 51 comments)
19. Why I hate the index finger (1980) (158 points | 63 comments)
20. Understanding the BM25 full text search algorithm (5 points | discuss)
21. Query Your Python Lists (16 points | 4 comments)
22. Chemist Identifies Mystery 'Blobs' Washing Up in Newfoundland (33 points | 16 comments)
23. Nominal for Storing, Structural for Manipulating (6 points | 4 comments)
24. 1-Bit AI Infrastructure (4 points | 1 comment)
25. The Data Engineering Handbook (108 points | 10 comments)
26. PaCMAP: Large-Scale Dimension Reduction with Both Global and Local Structure [pdf] (14 points | 1 comment)
27. Launch HN: Regatta Storage (YC F24) – Turn S3 into a local-like, POSIX cloud FS (547 points | 303 comments)
28. When did estimates turn into deadlines? (204 points | 140 comments)
29. The Analog Thing: Analog Computing for the Future (81 points | 21 comments)
30. Nickel Plating Handbook [pdf] (7 points | 1 comment)
